1.name: Goya Chanpuru
instructions: Stir-fry goya, tofu, and pork belly in soy sauce.
Add beaten eggs and cook until set.

2.name: Eels on Rice
instructions: Grill the eel fillet until fully cooked.
Mix soy sauce, mirin, and sugar in a pan and heat to create sauce.
Serve eel on top of cooked rice and drizzle with the sauce.

3.name: Pilaf
instructions: Sauté onions and carrots in butter.
Add rice and stir to coat.
Pour in chicken broth, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 20 minutes.

4.name: Toast
instructions: Spread butter on bread.
Toast in a toaster or on a pan until golden.

5.name: Pork Cutlet on Rice
instructions: Bread and fry the pork cutlet until golden.
Whisk eggs with soy sauce and cook lightly.
Serve pork cutlet on rice with egg mixture on top.

6.name: Beef Curry
instructions: Brown beef and onions in a pot.
Add carrots, potatoes, and curry powder.
Simmer until vegetables are tender and beef is cooked through.

7.name: Sushi
instructions: Prepare sushi rice and let it cool.
Place nori sheet on mat, spread rice evenly.
Add fish and roll tightly, slice into pieces.

8.name: Fish-Shaped Pancake with Bean Jam
instructions: Pour pancake batter into a fish-shaped mold.
Add sweet red bean paste and cook until golden on both sides.

9.name: Burger
instructions: Shape ground beef into patties and cook to your preference.
Toast buns and assemble burger with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

10.name: Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough.
Add cheese and toppings.
Bake in oven until crust is golden.

11.name: Sandwiches
instructions: Layer deli meats, cheese, and lettuce between slices of bread.
Spread mayonnaise inside the bread if desired.

12.name: Chicken-'n'-Egg on Rice
instructions: Cook chicken in soy sauce and sugar mixture.
Whisk eggs and pour over the chicken.
Serve over cooked rice.

13.name: Croissant
instructions: Roll out croissant dough and fold with butter.
Shape the dough and brush with egg wash.
Bake in the oven until golden brown.

14.name: Roll Bread
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, milk, butter, and sugar to make dough.
Let the dough rise until doubled in size.
Shape into rolls and bake until golden.

15.name: Raisin Bread
instructions: Mix dough ingredients, then fold in raisins.
Let dough rise until doubled.
Shape into loaves and bake.

16.name: Noodle
instructions: Boil ramen noodles and drain.
Prepare pork broth and add noodles.
Top with boiled egg, green onions, and chashu pork.

17.name: Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Sauté garlic and vegetables.
Add rice and soy sauce, mix in scrambled eggs.

18.name: Tempura Bowl
instructions: Dip shrimp and vegetables in tempura batter and fry.
Serve over cooked rice with soy sauce.

19.name: Bibimbap
instructions: Cook and season vegetables.
Fry an egg sunny-side up.
Serve rice with vegetables, egg, and gochujang, and drizzle with sesame oil.

20.name: Udon Noodle
instructions: Boil udon noodles and drain.
Heat dashi broth and soy sauce, then add noodles.
Top with green onions before serving.

21.name: Tempura Udon
instructions: Boil udon noodles and drain.
Fry shrimp in tempura batter until golden.
Serve noodles in hot dashi broth with tempura shrimp on top.

22.name: Soba Noodle
instructions: Boil soba noodles and drain.
Heat dashi broth and soy sauce.
Serve noodles with broth and garnish with scallions.

23.name: Chip Butty
instructions: Toast bread and spread with butter.
Add a layer of cooked french fries.
Drizzle with ketchup and assemble the sandwich.

24.name: Beef Noodle
instructions: Simmer beef with soy sauce and star anise until tender.
Boil noodles and drain.
Serve noodles with beef broth and garnish with green onions.

25.name: Tensin Noodle
instructions: Cook shrimp in tempura batter until crispy.
Boil noodles and drain.
Serve noodles with soy sauce broth and tempura shrimp.

26.name: Fried Noodle
instructions: Stir-fry garlic and vegetables.
Add boiled noodles and soy sauce.
Toss until noodles are evenly fried and coated.

27.name: Spaghetti
instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente and drain.
Sauté garlic in olive oil and add tomato sauce.
Toss spaghetti in sauce and serve.

28.name: Japanese-Style Pancake
instructions: Mix flour, eggs, and cabbage to form a batter.
Cook on a hot plate with pork belly until golden.
Drizzle with okonomiyaki sauce.

29.name: Takoyaki
instructions: Heat takoyaki pan and pour in batter.
Add octopus pieces and green onions to each round.
Turn until golden brown, serve with takoyaki sauce and bonito flakes.

30.name: Gratin
instructions: Slice potatoes and layer in a dish.
Pour cream and garlic over the potatoes, sprinkle with cheese.
Bake until golden and bubbling.

31.name: Sauteed Vegetables
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and sauté vegetables until tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

32.name: Croquette
instructions: Mix mashed potatoes and ground meat together.
Shape into patties, coat in flour, egg, and bread crumbs.
Fry until golden and crispy.

33.name: Grilled Eggplant
instructions: Slice eggplant and brush with olive oil.
Grill until tender and slightly charred.
Sprinkle with garlic and salt before serving.

34.name: Sauteed Spinach
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, season with salt.

35.name: Vegetable Tempura
instructions: Dip vegetables in tempura batter.
Fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

36.name: Miso Soup
instructions: Heat dashi broth and stir in miso paste.
Add tofu, green onions, and seaweed, and simmer until warm.

37.name: Potage
instructions: Cook potatoes, carrots, and onions in chicken broth.
Blend until smooth, then stir in cream and simmer.

38.name: Sausage
instructions: Heat oil in a pan.
Cook sausages until browned and fully cooked.
Serve with mustard.

39.name: Oden
instructions: Simmer fish cakes, daikon, eggs, and konnyaku in dashi broth.
Serve hot with a side of mustard.

40.name: Omelet
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Melt butter in a pan and cook eggs, folding gently into an omelet shape.

41.name: Ganmodoki
instructions: Mash tofu and mix with grated carrots and lotus root.
Shape into balls, coat in flour and egg, then fry until golden.

42.name: Jiaozi
instructions: Mix ground pork, cabbage, and garlic.
Spoon mixture into dumpling wrappers and seal.
Pan-fry dumplings until crispy, then steam with a bit of water.

43.name: Stew
instructions: Brown beef in a pot, add vegetables and broth.
Simmer until beef is tender and vegetables are soft.

44.name: Teriyaki Grilled Fish
instructions: Marinate fish in soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and ginger.
Grill until fish is fully cooked and caramelized.

45.name: Fried Fish
instructions: Coat fish fillets in flour, egg, and bread crumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy.

46.name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Brush salmon with olive oil and season with garlic, herbs, and lemon.
Grill until cooked through and slightly charred.

47.name: Salmon Meuniere
instructions: Coat salmon in flour and pan-fry in butter until golden.
Serve with lemon juice and parsley.

48.name: Sashimi
instructions: Slice fresh raw fish thinly.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

49.name: Grilled Pacific Saury
instructions: Season Pacific saury with salt and grill until charred.
Serve with lemon and soy sauce.

50.name: Sukiyaki
instructions: Cook beef and vegetables in a soy sauce, sugar, and mirin broth.
Serve hot with rice.

51.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
instructions: Stir-fry pork, pineapple, and bell peppers.
Add a sauce made of vinegar and sugar, cook until thickened.

52.name: Lightly Roasted Fish
instructions: Lightly roast fish in the oven with olive oil, lemon, and herbs.
Serve warm with a drizzle of olive oil.

53.name: Steamed Egg Hotchpotch
instructions: Mix eggs with dashi broth and add chicken, shrimp, and vegetables.
Steam until the eggs are set and the dish is firm.

54.name: Tempura
instructions: Dip shrimp and vegetables in tempura batter.
Fry until golden and crispy.

55.name: Fried Chicken
instructions: Coat chicken pieces in flour, egg, and bread crumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy.

56.name: Sirloin Cutlet
instructions: Coat sirloin steak in flour, egg, and bread crumbs.
Fry until golden and the meat is cooked through.

57.name: Nanbanzuke
instructions: Fry fish fillets and marinate in vinegar and soy sauce with sliced carrots and onions.
Serve chilled.

58.name: Boiled Fish
instructions: Boil fish in a mixture of soy sauce, mirin, sake, and ginger until fully cooked.

59.name: Seasoned Beef with Potatoes
instructions: Simmer beef slices and potatoes in soy sauce, sugar, and mirin until tender.

60.name: Hambarg Steak
instructions: Mix ground beef, onions, breadcrumbs, and eggs.
Shape into patties and pan-fry until browned on both sides.
Serve with Worcestershire sauce.

61.name: Beef Steak
instructions: Season steak with salt and pepper.
Pan-fry in butter and garlic until cooked to desired doneness.

62.name: Dried Fish
instructions: Salt the fish and dry it in the sun.
Grill the dried fish and serve with soy sauce.

63.name: Ginger Pork Saute
instructions: Sauté pork slices with ginger in soy sauce and mirin until cooked through.

64.name: Spicy Chili-Flavored Tofu
instructions: Stir-fry tofu in chili sauce, garlic, and soy sauce until spicy and fragrant.

65.name: Yakitori
instructions: Skewer chicken and grill, basting with a mixture of soy sauce, sake, mirin, and sugar.

66.name: Cabbage Roll
instructions: Blanch cabbage leaves and stuff them with ground beef, onions, and carrots.
Roll up and cook in tomato sauce until tender.

67.name: Rolled Omelet
instructions: Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and sugar.
Cook in a pan, rolling the omelet as it sets.

68.name: Egg Sunny-Side Up
instructions: Heat butter in a pan and fry eggs sunny-side up.
Season with salt and pepper.

69.name: Fermented Soybeans
instructions: Serve fermented soybeans with soy sauce and mustard for dipping.

70.name: Cold Tofu
instructions: Serve chilled tofu with soy sauce, grated ginger, and chopped green onions.

71.name: Egg Roll
instructions: Beat eggs and stir in carrots and green onions.
Cook in a pan, rolling the mixture as it sets.

72.name: Chilled Noodle
instructions: Cook noodles and chill them.
Serve with soy sauce, sesame oil, and garnished with cucumber and tomato.

73.name: Stir-Fried Beef and Peppers
instructions: Stir-fry beef slices with bell peppers, garlic, and ginger in soy sauce until cooked through.

74.name: Simmered Pork
instructions: Simmer pork belly in a mixture of soy sauce, sugar, sake, and ginger until tender.

75.name: Boiled Chicken and Vegetables
instructions: Boil chicken and vegetables in a broth flavored with soy sauce and garlic until cooked through.

76.name: Sashimi Bowl
instructions: Place sliced sashimi on top of a bowl of rice.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

77.name: Sushi Bowl
instructions: Fill a bowl with sushi rice and top with assorted sashimi.
Serve with soy sauce, nori, and wasabi.

78.name: Chicken Rice
instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger in oil.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add rice and soy sauce, mix well.

79.name: Shrimp with Chili Sauce
instructions: Stir-fry shrimp with garlic, ginger, and chili sauce.
Add soy sauce and cook until shrimp are fully coated.

80.name: Roast Chicken
instructions: Rub the chicken with olive oil, garlic, and rosemary.
Roast in the oven until fully cooked.
Squeeze lemon juice over before serving.

81.name: Steamed Meat Dumpling
instructions: Mix ground pork, green onions, ginger, and soy sauce.
Fill dumpling wrappers and steam until cooked through.

82.name: Omelet with Fried Rice
instructions: Make a thin omelet with beaten eggs.
Fill with fried rice and fold into an omelet shape.
Serve with ketchup on top.

83.name: Cutlet Curry
instructions: Fry the breaded pork cutlet until crispy.
Serve over rice with curry sauce.

84.name: Spaghetti Meat Sauce
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef with onions and garlic, then add tomato sauce.
Serve meat sauce over cooked spaghetti.

85.name: Fried Shrimp
instructions: Coat shrimp in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy.

86.name: Potato Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender.
Mix with mayonnaise, carrots, cucumbers, and onions.

87.name: Green Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
Toss with olive oil and vinegar.

88.name: Macaroni Salad
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package instructions.
Mix with mayonnaise, carrots, onions, and peas.

89.name: Japanese Tofu and Vegetable Chowder
instructions: Simmer tofu and vegetables in dashi broth.
Stir in miso paste before serving.

90.name: Pork Miso Soup
instructions: Simmer pork, tofu, and miso paste in dashi broth.
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

91.name: Chinese Soup
instructions: Simmer chicken broth with ginger and green onions.
Add tofu and season with soy sauce.

92.name: Beef Bowl
instructions: Cook beef slices and onions in a mixture of soy sauce and sugar.
Serve over rice.

93.name: Kinpira-Style Sauteed Burdock
instructions: Saute burdock root and carrots in soy sauce and sugar.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.

94.name: Rice Ball
instructions: Shape rice into a ball.
Sprinkle with salt and wrap in nori.

95.name: Pizza Toast
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on bread slices.
Top with cheese and pepperoni.
Toast until cheese is melted.

96.name: Dipping Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Serve with a dipping sauce made from soy sauce and dashi broth.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.

97.name: Hot Dog
instructions: Grill or boil the sausage.
Place it in the bun and top with ketchup and mustard.

98.name: French Fries
instructions: Cut potatoes into strips and fry in hot oil until crispy.
Season with salt.

99.name: Mixed Rice
instructions: Mix cooked rice with vegetables, soy sauce, and sesame oil.

100.name: Rice
instructions: Rinse the rice under cold water.
Place rice and water in a pot.
Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
